From: Cisco IOS Configuration Fundamentals Command Reference
FuncDef: To check the syntax configuration, use the **configure check syntax**commandinprivilegedEXEC mode.

ParaDef.Info: (Optional) Location or the address of the source to be checked.

RelatedCmds.description: Cancels the timed rollback and triggers the rollback immediately, or resets the parameters for the timed rollback.
